en-US.alert_about: Embed shortcuts within other shortcuts, streamlining the development of complicated shortcuts.
en-US.alert_donate: Thank you for donating and supporting my development of shortcuts like Embed Shortcuts!
en-US.alert_help_1:
Embed Shortcuts is a tool for inserting complete shortcuts inside of other shorcuts.

Use it to separate modules of reusable code in your shortcuts.
en-US.alert_help_2:
Embed Shortcuts works by looking for specially-formatted comments in a shortcut. It replaces the comment with the complete contents of another shortcut.

The comment should contain a single line with the text:

*EmbedShortcut:XYZ*

Where XYZ is the name of the shortcut you want to embed.
en-US.alert_help_3:
To embed shortcuts into another shortcut, follow these steps:

1. Add Embed Shortcut comments to the target shortcut.

2. Open Embed Shortcuts.

3. Tap Embed Shortcuts.

4. Select the target shortcut.

The shortcut will be processed and any Embed Shortcut comments will be replaced, provided the referenced shortcut exists on the iOS device.
en-US.alert_help_4:
After processing is complete, Embed Shortcuts will list out all of the matched an unmatched shortcuts in the new shortcut.

To download the new shortcut to your iOS device, tap Download Shortcut.

An iCloud Link to the shortcut will be created, and Safari will open, allowing you to download it to your Shortcuts library.
en-US.alert_help_5: You can see the differences between the original shortcut and the one processed by Embed Shortcuts by choosing the Show Differences menu item after processing is complete.
en-US.alert_update_none: You are running the latest version of Embed Shortcuts.
en-US.alert_localization:
Want to see Embed Shortcuts localized in your language?

Visit the localization page for more details.
en-US.error_extract_nothing: No Extract Shortcut action blocks could be found in this shortcut.
en-US.menu_update_available_description: A new version of Embed Shortcuts is available
en-US.prompt_donate:
Have you been enjoying how Embed Shortcuts has enhanced and streamlined your development of writing shortcuts?

If so, consider sending me a tip as a token of appreciation!
